articles.title: History! Astronaut makes FIRST TikTok video ever from International Space Station! - HT Tech
articles.description: A European Space Agency’s astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti has just made history! The first TikTok video from space on the International Space Station. Check all details.
articles.content: Astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti of the European Space Agency (ESA) has taken the popularity of TikTok to extreme heights in the literal sense! Samantha Cristoforetti, who is part of SpaceX's Crew-4 … [+2007 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: How Reliance Refinery Is Making Millions From Ukraine War Windfall | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The refiner, owned by Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani, is buying discounted cargoes of crude after self-sanctions on Russian fuels by some European Union companies pushed up margins on some oil products to three-year highs
articles.content: Russias invasion of Ukraine has opened arbitrage opportunities so enticing that Reliance Industries Ltd. deferred maintenance work at the worlds biggest oil refining complex to churn out more diesel … [+2149 chars]

articles.author: RFE/RL
articles.title: Chelsea Soccer Club Sold To U.S.-Led Investors, Ending Ownership By Russian Oligarch Abramovich - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: The British soccer club Chelsea will be sold to a group of investors led by an American billionaire, formally ending nearly two decades of ownership by Kremlin-connected oligarch Roman Abramovich.
